logout.description: You have been successfully logged out.

region.title: Language and Region
region.description: Customize the language and currency for your experience.

detection.title: Automatic Detection
detection.auto_config: Your language and currency have been set automatically. You can change them manually above.
detection.not_detected: We couldn't automatically detect your region. Default settings have been applied.

activity_history.title: Activity History
activity_history.description: A log of recent activity on your account.

content_preferences.title: Content Preferences
content_preferences.description: Select your favorite categories to receive personalized recommendations.

categories_desc.Deportes: Includes all professional and college sports events. Covers major leagues like soccer, basketball (NBA), baseball (MLB), hockey (NHL), football (NFL), and also motorsports, tennis, golf, and wrestling.
categories_desc.Conciertos: Musical events ranging from international pop artist tours, rock bands, hip-hop, electronic music, and massive music festivals.
categories_desc.Teatro y Artes Escénicas: Covers dramatic shows, Broadway musicals, plays, opera, ballet, contemporary dance, and productions by local and international theater companies.
categories_desc.Comedia: Performances by stand-up comedians, monologue tours, comedy festivals, and improv shows. Ideal for finding a humorous plan.
categories_desc.Festivales: Focuses on long-duration events that combine multiple acts or genres. Generally includes music festivals (Lollapalooza, Coachella), food or cultural festivals, and large annual celebrations.
categories_desc.Navideño y Fin de Año: Seasonal shows, concerts of bagpipes and carols, light-up ceremonies, New Year's Eve dinners, and Christmas-themed fairs.
categories_desc.Conferencias: Includes academic, professional, and corporate events where papers, talks, and debates are presented. Covers keynotes, symposiums, congresses, specialized forums, and innovation meetings in various fields of knowledge.
categories_desc.Actos Universitarios: Includes official ceremonies and activities of educational institutions. Covers graduation ceremonies, award ceremonies, academic inaugurations, and cultural events organized by universities.
categories_desc.Salud y Bienestar: Includes activities focused on physical and mental well-being. Covers sports days, mass yoga, health fairs, meditation workshops, and healthy living events.
categories_desc.Tecnología e Innovación: Includes meetings on technological advances and new ideas. Covers hackathons, innovation fairs, startup congresses, technology product launches, and applied science conferences.
categories_desc.Moda y Creatividad: Includes events related to design, art, and creative expression. Covers fashion shows, art exhibitions, design fairs, photography exhibitions, and creativity festivals.
categories_desc.Gastronómicos: Includes events centered on food and drink. Covers gastronomic festivals, coffee fairs, wine tastings, culinary competitions, and gourmet experiences.

bookings.title: My Bookings
bookings.no_bookings_desc: When you book a ticket for an event, it will appear here.
bookings.server_error_desc: Could not load bookings. Please try again later.
bookings.connection_error_desc: Please check your internet connection and try again.

ticket_details.virtual_event_confirmed_desc: This event will be held online. Click the button to access the virtual meeting.
ticket_details.access_pending_desc: The link to join the event will be available here once your booking is confirmed.
ticket_details.cancel_booking_confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking? All associated additional services will also be canceled. This action cannot be undone.
ticket_details.partial_cancellation_desc_1: The event booking was canceled, but there was an error canceling the additional services. Please contact support.
ticket_details.partial_cancellation_desc_2: The event booking was canceled, but the status of additional services could not be verified. Please contact support.
